panel.inputFileSelection.chooseFromeTemp: Choose the Linux distribution to install:
panel.information.requirementsExplanatio: These are the minimum system requirements for installing the target Linux distribution:
panel.information.informationExplanation: See the following link for additional information about the selected Linux distribution:
panel.hint.explanation: You will need the following information to complete this dialog. The listed information is typically provided by hardware or network administrators of the system to be installed.
panel.hint.listItem2: OSA device number, layer 2 setting and port number, or
panel.hint.listItem3: PCI device FID or UID, and the partition PCI UID uniqueness setting
panel.hint.listItem8: Host IP address, and netmask or prefix
panel.hint.listItem11: Network URL of installation source (e.g. FTP server), including username and password, if needed
panel.networkDevice.deviceTypeHelp: OSA (Open Systems Adapter) or RoCE (PCI RDMA over Converged Ethernet)
panel.networkDevice.vlanIdHelp: Enter a VLAN ID between 1 and 4094.
panel.networkDevice.readChannelHelp: Device bus-ID of the OSA read channel in the format x.y.zzzz.
panel.networkDevice.writeChannelHelp: Device bus-ID of the OSA write channel in the format x.y.zzzz.
panel.networkDevice.dataChannelHelp: Device bus-ID of the OSA data channel in the format x.y.zzzz.
panel.networkDevice.layerTwoToggleHelp: Select 1 for Layer 2 (ethernet) mode, or 0 for Layer 3 (IP) mode
panel.networkDevice.portNumberToggleHelp: Network port to use (0 or 1) in case of networking cards with multiple ports.
panel.networkDevice.fidHelp: Function ID (FID) of the PCI network device in hexadecimal format.
panel.networkDevice.uidHelp: User-defined identifier (UID) of the PCI network device in hexadecimal format.
panel.networkAddress.networkAddressIPv4H: IPv4 address assigned to the host
panel.networkAddress.networkAddressIPv6H: IPv6 address assigned to the host
panel.networkAddress.networkPrefixIPv4He: IPv4 network prefix length between 1 and 32
panel.networkAddress.networkPrefixIPv6He: IPv6 network prefix length between 1 and 128
panel.networkAddress.hostnameHelp: Host name, optionally including domain name
panel.installationParameter.installation: URL of network installation source (HTTP/HTTPS, FTP)
panel.installationParameter.missingRemot: The IP version selected while configuring the network address does not correspond with the value for the hostname as used in the above URL.
panel.installationParameter.computedInst: Installation URL including username and password
panel.installationParameter.usernameHelp: Username for accessing network installation source
panel.installationParameter.passwordHelp: Password for accessing network installation source
panel.installationParameter.vncToggleHel: Activate VNC remote access to graphical installer UI
panel.installationParameter.vncPasswordH: Specify a password for VNC access
panel.installationParameter.sshToggleHel: Activate SSH remote access to text-based installer UI
panel.downloadParamFile.incompletOrInval: The data provided is incomplete or invalid. The installation may fail.
panel.downloadParamFile.paramFileHelp: Boot parameters required for the installation
panel.downloadParamFile.modifiedDataNoti: The data provided has been modified. Changes made here are discarded when returning to a previous dialog step.
panel.nextSteps.explanation2: Once the installer is started, use a VNC client to connect to the system at the following address:
panel.nextSteps.explanation3: Once the installer is started, use an SSH client to connect to the system at the following address:
panel.nextSteps.listItem1: Prepare an FTP server with the installer boot files from the RHEL installer ISO:
panel.nextSteps.listItem4: Replace the file named <1>genericdvd.prm</1> with the parmfile contents downloaded from this application.
panel.nextSteps.listItem5: Log on to the IBM Z Hardware Management Console (HMC) that manages the LPAR.
panel.nextSteps.listItem6: Go to the <1>Systems Management</1> view for the mainframe containing the LPAR.
panel.nextSteps.listItem8: Select the task <1>Recovery -> Load from Removable Media or Server</1>.
panel.nextSteps.listItem9: Enter the parameters for the FTP server.
panel.nextSteps.missingRemoteAccessNotif: Neither VNC nor SSH remote access has been configured. The installation system cannot be manually controlled.
